org.apache.solr.common.util
Class RTimer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.solr.common.util.RTimer

public class RTimer
extends Object

A recursive timer. RTimers are started automatically when instantiated; subtimers are also started automatically when created.

Since:
solr 1.3
Version:
$Id: RTimer.java 724867 2008-12-09 20:23:52Z ryan $
